https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9VXuVj8utWXI9lyB9kIQTE31OUp.jpg Jihyeon works as a temp at a university, writing and making films. One day he finds he has confusing feelings towards Geon-u, a younger schoolmate. The two men fall in love with each other, bringing controversy among colleagues. Black Summer
